attributes.action: immediately allow the voters of this country a referendum on the construction of mosques and minarets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Switzerland is a true democracy.  The people wanted a referendum, to be able to cast a vote on the way they want their country run and their probitive, honest and honourable elected representatives allowed them to have one.  The voters of this country are denied referenda EVEN AFTER POLITICIANS USE THE PROMISE OF ONE TO GARNER VOTES TO GET THEMSELVES INTO POWER AND THEN REFUSE ON THE BASIS THAT THE GOALPOSTS HAVE MOVED.  Thank our God for countries like Switzerland I say!
